product_description: Besides its cool comfort and figure-forgiving fit, you'll love this simple jersey-knit dress for the swingy movement of its elliptical-cut hem.
product_details_and_care:
Besides its cool comfort and figure-forgiving fit, you'll love this simple jersey-knit dress for the swingy movement of its elliptical-cut hem.
36" length (size Medium).
Slips on over head.
Scooped neck.
Cap sleeves.
90% rayon, 10% spandex.
Machine wash cold, dry flat.
By Karen Kane; made in the USA.
Available online only.
Item #1039192
